goal.ch:
a) Problem-Solving Proficiency: Develop skills in applying deep learning techniques to address challenges in
data assimilation, improving predictive accuracy in forecasting tasks.
(b) Algorithmic Understanding: Gain a deep understanding of algorithms in deep learning data assimilation,
encompassing theoretical foundations and practical implementations for effectively integrating simulation, learning, and data.
(c) Programming Skill Enhancement: Enhance programming proficiency, particularly in relevant packages like
Python with libraries such as TensorFlow or PyTorch, for implementing and optimizing deep learning algorithms in data assimilation tasks.
(d) Teamwork and Collaboration: Collaborate effectively within the team to design and implement a deep
learning-based data assimilation framework, leveraging individual strengths to achieve project objectives.

outline.ch:
Topic: Enhancing Predictive Accuracy through Deep Learning Data Assimilation: Integrating Simulation, Learning, and Data
(a) Framework Development: Collaboratively designed and implemented a deep learning-based data assimilation
framework using Python, TensorFlow, or PyTorch, as well as the MATLAB toolbox. Possible learning approaches within data assimilation will be explored. These approaches include:
• Replacing the PDE-based predictor with a learning-based predictor.
• Learning the model and measurement error covariance matrices.
• Learning the fundamental relations between variables.
• Directly learning the Kalman gain by establishing a relationship between observations and the background.
• Learning future data, which serves as pseudo observations assimilated
with measurements and the PDE-based prediction
(b) Performance Evaluation:
Evaluate the framework’s performance using simulated and real-world observational data, focusing on real-world forecasting tasks like space weather or traffic flow predictions.
